about_the_game:
"Game of Fate2-Digital Upgraded Edition" package includes:

• VIP exquisite avatar frame, showing your dignity in rankings, message boards, etc.

• Actors’ electronic signatures added to the front of the tarot cards

• 4K wallpaper with electronic signature

※ This product does not include the game itself. Users who already own the digital standard version of "Game of Fate 2: A Century's Promise" can obtain the above igital Upgraded Edition rewards after purchasing this upgrade package

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains sensitive contents such as partial nudity or sexual content, as well as alcohol use, may not be suitable for all age ranges.

short_description: Transported back a century by fate, you find yourself in a legendary tale of vengeance. Amidst powerful enemies in a tumultuous era, your mission is to assist those around you. Experience this immersive epic from a first-person perspective—authentic, weighty, yet brimming with hope.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
